title: Basket
description: A modern, responsive e-commerce web application built with React, Redux Toolkit, React Router, Material-UI, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Time Zone
description: An e-commerce web application built with React, React Router, React Query, Formik, and Bootstrap.

title: Exclusive
description: An e-commerce web application built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, featuring product listings, a shopping cart, and a checkout process.

title: Burger King clone
description: A clone of the Burger King website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, replicating the layout and some functionality of the original site.
